actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the President's determination not to grant import relief to the U.S. sugar industry.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of Congress with respect to the action taken by, or the determination of, the President (under the authority conferred by the Trade Act of 1974) to adjust customs duties to prevent serious injury to an industry) transmitted to the Congress on May 4, 1976.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the President's determination not to grant import relief to the U.S. sugar industry.
